author: costin
msg: To avoid confusions, remove the "run" target ( which was broken for some
time and uses server.xml ) and rename run2.
This won't work without reverting the Engine name ( or fixing the registration )
In embed mode, we rely a lot on the domain name - a component can
locate it's parent by using the component name ( and the domain )
to construct the parent name. If Engine is identified by both domain
and name - that becomes impossible. In addition it makes it difficult

author: costin
msg: For people who read the commit messages :-) - it is possible to
use this target to start a JMX console and proxies to multiple
tomcat and Apache/IIS/etc+mod_jk2 instances and see all in the
same console.  Still very far from having /admin working, but

author: remm
msg: - I don't see where MX4J tools is needed.

msg: - Missing: schema validation of the final web.xml. Most likely a new task
